CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW `view_qm_results` AS SELECT `samp`.`PROCESS_ORDER` AS `PROCESS_ORDER`, `samp`.`MATERIAL` AS `MATERIAL`, `samp`.`SAMPLE_ID` AS `SAMPLE_ID`, `samp`.`SAMPLE_DATE` AS `SAMPLE_DATE`, `samp`.`USER_DATA_1` AS `USER_DATA_1`, `samp`.`USER_DATA_2` AS `USER_DATA_2`, `samp`.`USER_DATA_3` AS `USER_DATA_3`, `samp`.`USER_DATA_4` AS `USER_DATA_4`, `result`.`TEST_ID` AS `TEST_ID`, `dict`.`DESCRIPTION` AS `TEST_DESCRIPTION`, `result`.`VALUE` AS `VALUE`, COALESCE(`valist`.`DESCRIPTION`, `result`.`VALUE`) AS `RESULT` FROM (((`app_qm_sample` `samp` LEFT JOIN `app_qm_result` `result` ON ((`result`.`SAMPLE_ID` = `samp`.`SAMPLE_ID`))) LEFT JOIN `app_qm_dictionary` `dict` ON ((`dict`.`TEST_ID` = `result`.`TEST_ID`))) LEFT JOIN `app_qm_selectlist` `valist` ON (((`valist`.`SELECT_LIST_ID` = `dict`.`SELECT_LIST_ID`) AND (`valist`.`VALUE` = `result`.`VALUE`))));
